name: Super Space Thingy 3D
description:
Made in 7 days.

You fly in your cool red space ship, exploring a system of planets and planetoids.

Can you discover them all?

Will you go down in history as the greatest and best and most well-dressed space explorer ever to fly a red space ship??

Xbox 360 controller recommended!
